details:
The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Herat AFG

 
Princeton Encyclopedia of Classical Sites states: "Founded in 330, at Artacoana, capital of the province of that name at, or near, Herat on the Hari river."

properties.description: Representative location of Herat from Cuneiform Inscriptions Geographical Site Index (CIGS) .
properties.title: CIGS Location
